participant_1.background:
My friends are the people I can be myself with and who support me no matter what.
I am a small business owner trying to make my mark in the horse racing industry.
I just finished talking to my father about his career as a cop.
I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.
i love watching sitcoms on television.

participant_2.background:
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.
I'm trying to get my mother to love me.
i have always wanted a pot bellied pig.
I play the piano to help my siblings relax.
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.

content.text: Hey! Not much. Just finished filming a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams.
That sounds really interesting! What kind of dreams were they following?
One person wanted to open a restaurant, one wanted to start their own business, and one wanted to become a doctor.
Those are all really great dreams! I'm sure they were all really happy to have you document their journeys.
Thanks! I was really happy to be able to tell their stories.
What are you up to next?
I'm not sure yet. I'm kind of in a transitional period right now. I'm trying to decide what I want to do with my life.
I know that feeling. It can be tough to figure out what you want to do with your life.
Yeah, it can be. But I'm sure I'll figure it out eventually.
I'm sure you will too. You seem like a smart and capable person.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch sitcoms on television. I also like to read, play piano, and go for walks.
Those all sound like really fun things to do. I love reading and going for walks too.
Nice! We should hang out sometime. We could watch a sitcom or go for a walk together.
That sounds like a great idea
